thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I had no idea about showers until ours broke. After ordering the wrong part I phoned up, spoke to someone who was very happy to help and he told me where I had gone wrong and what the correct part I wanted was and gave me some advice as to what could have caused the problem in the first place. Next day delivery on both orders and no issues returning the part I didn't need. Very satisfied customer!
